action.text: Amendment SA 3143, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3143 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3143 proposed by Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S5218-5220) To provide a manager's amendment.
